title: Friends chat broken?
body:
So i logged in today, went to message a friend and found that all of the messages i had sent were not visible and it was only showing the bubbles in which they sit in, newly sent messages don't show text either its just the bubble.

Any idea why its doing this?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [running a client repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) for me, let me know if this helps.
